name: Kaku
text: On Play: You may return 2 cards with (CP) in its type from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

effect.text: You may return 2 cards with (CP) in its type from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order. K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.
